name: vickie armistead
text: I haven't had a bad experience here with both the food or the customer service. Very friendly staff and great happy hour. I love their pizza.

name: Pamela Dawn
text: Waited for 10 minutes to place an order in the store. At least 2 employees in the back seemed to see us standing there but no effort was made to take our order. Got the impression that everyone was having a great time in the back and not very interested in taking our order. Went to Dominoes.

name: Andria JACKSON
text: For the most part they always seem to get my order correct and in a timely manner.

text: This pizza hut apparently really stepped it up recently (given other recent reviews).  Came here a few times last couple weeks, and each time I had great service/food. Their wings are to die for.  One employee stood out as the best, I think â€¦More

text: Food was pretty good, entrance is pretty hidden. Pizza is ALWAYS ready when I arrive. Definitely a plus!!!

text: I've been here for over a year and happily receiving their pizza. Then the decide they can't deliver to me anymore... Breaks my heart when they can't deliver 3 miles away anymore..

text: I completely agree with everyone else... I'd rather drive to the Pizza Hut 5 miles away; at least they have decent people who work there and they know how to make a pizza. â€¦More

text: I stopped dealing with this Pizza Hut 5 years ago because of the horrible service and nasty employee attutudes but decided to try again because of an internet 1/2 price special. BIG NISTAKE! i arrived to pick up my order,  waited in the â€¦More

text: I've had no issues with their carryout and the food is good quality.

name: Erika Wright
text: The reviews are a little old now, so here's an update. I've been ordering from this Pizza Hut for two years now and they've never gotten an order wrong. The pizza delivery guys are always very friendly and the food is always hot when I get it!

name: Lloyd Brown
text: Emeila is the WORST.  Took my credit card info over the phone, gave me a price and said 45 min.  90 min later i call and ask if the pizza was coming, she says she has no record from my number.  I go up to the store and her nasty ass says it â€¦More

text: When there for a carry out. Staff was not friendly and the pizza sauce tasted a bit under cooked

name: Fred Porter
text: These sorry mofos stop taking orders at 1045..claiming no delivery drivers, orderso take 15mins, etc etc..this is straight crap!!

name: Ashleigh Gallo
text: Waited for over an hour for delivery. I called the establishment 15 minutes after my scheduled delivery and was told the delivery was 10 minutes away. Still nothing!

name: Mel G
text: First and LAST order ever. 75 minutes for delivery to Belvoir, arrived without the Pepsi we ordered. Was offered a $15 credit for next order and would send driver back out with pepsi. Um no, I don't think so. After complaining enough got a â€¦More

text: Stay away from this place!!! This is the nastiest place ever. Not once but 2x I have ordered here and there has been hair in my food!!! They don't wear hair nets or nothing

text: Carry out service was horrible. I live .5 miles from the store and it was cold. I got a credit for $5.00 I don't think so. Never again.

text: Terrible place - they never get my order right and it's ALWAYS cold when I pick it up or have it delivered. Gross environment.
